attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should murderers be allowed to be kept alive if they don't value other peoples lives and murder innocent people? We spend our taxes on keeping them alive when they have killed innocent people. New identities are given out to protect them, and a jail sentence for life isn't enough, their lives should be stopped just like of their victims.

Some names just to mention:
Peter Sutcliffe,
Ian Huntley and Maxine Carr
Peter Tobin
Robert Thompson & John Venables
Peter Chapman
Some of the murderers in the UK still currently alive after murdering innocent people.
